fca3067963.name: Attack
fca3067963.description: Your basic attack. A fundamental technique every shinobi starts with, dealing damage based on your power stat.

624146c2fc.name: Transformation Jutsu
624146c2fc.description: Transform, gaining a massive power boost for 3 rounds. Your power multiplies by 5x, making this a solid early-game buff.

fcb042c476.name: Infused Chakra Blade
fcb042c476.description: Strike with chakra-infused blades that cause bleeding and massively increase your power. Deals solid damage, applies a 15% bleed effect for 1 round, and boosts your power by 25x for 2 rounds.

8f82e90141.name: Mystic Palm
8f82e90141.description: A healing technique that restores health based on your missing HP. The lower your health, the more effective this becomes. Heals 40% of your max health plus a flat 100 HP.

0869a31136.name: Summon Ninken
0869a31136.description: Summon ninja dogs to pin down your opponent, stunning them for 2 rounds. Perfect for setting up devastating combos.

f44e85c4b8.name: Analysis
f44e85c4b8.description: Take a moment to strategize and regain chakra. Grants 5 chakra instantly with no cost - essentially a free chakra refill.

030d7ab45c.name: Fireball Jutsu
030d7ab45c.description: Launch a massive fireball at your enemy. A classic Uchiha technique that deals respectable fire damage.

27a4b3cb07.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
27a4b3cb07.description: Summon clones to overwhelm your opponent with numbers. Your clones attack together, dealing heavy damage in a coordinated assault.

2854c463d8.name: One Thousand Years of Death
2854c463d8.description: The legendary technique... you poke the enemy's butt. Surprisingly effective for its low cost, though the damage is minimal.

e686331541.name: Burning Ash
e686331541.description: Spew ash across the battlefield that ignites, burning your opponent. Deals damage and applies a burn effect that chips away 10% of their health per round for 2 rounds.

aae1fa80cc.name: Sexy Jutsu
aae1fa80cc.obtainment: Obtained from Naruto mentor at Chuunin rank
aae1fa80cc.description: Transform into a dazzling figure that distracts your opponent, causing them to flinch for 2 rounds. Don't underestimate the power of distraction.

91c16b8f04.name: Kirin
91c16b8f04.obtainment: Obtained from Sasuke mentor at Chuunin rank
91c16b8f04.description: Summon a lightning bolt from the thunder clouds above, striking your enemy for massive damage. One of Sasuke's most devastating techniques.

5ed73fffa7.name: Lightning Blade
5ed73fffa7.obtainment: Obtained from Kakashi mentor at Chuunin rank
5ed73fffa7.description: Gather chakra into a thunderous blade of lightning and strike your opponent. Kakashi's signature move that delivers consistent damage.

d251722080.name: Cherry Blossom Impact
d251722080.obtainment: Obtained from Sakura mentor at Chuunin rank
d251722080.description: Attack with cherry blossoms. Don't let the pretty name fool you - Sakura's monstrous strength makes this hit hard.

73748aae1e.name: Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced
73748aae1e.obtainment: Obtained from Asuma at Chuunin mentor rank
73748aae1e.description: An upgraded version of the basic chakra blade. Deals more damage, applies stronger bleeding (5% per round for 2 rounds), and boosts your power by 25x for 3 rounds.

625a61216a.name: Rasengan
625a61216a.obtainment: Obtained from Naruto at Jounin rank
625a61216a.description: Naruto's trademark spiraling sphere of chakra. Why are you even reading this description? You know what the Rasengan does - it hits like a truck.

f36847b5a5.name: Lightning Blade: All Out
f36847b5a5.obtainment: Obtained from Kakashi at Jounin mentor rank
f36847b5a5.description: An enhanced Lightning Blade performed with pure rage. Lightning engulfs the battlefield, dealing massive damage, reducing enemy stats by 5%, and causing bleeding.

50eee08b3f.name: Shadow Strangle
50eee08b3f.obtainment: Obtained from Shikamaru at Jounin mentor rank
50eee08b3f.description: Use your shadow to strangle your opponent, dealing damage and stunning them for 2 rounds. A brutal technique that shows Shikamaru's dark side.

8a60b10809.name: Mystic Palm Enhanced
8a60b10809.obtainment: Obtained from Sakura at Jounin mentor rank
8a60b10809.description: An enhanced healing technique that restores 70% of your max health. When you absolutely need to stay in the fight.

8341425caf.name: Ephemeral
8341425caf.obtainment: Obtained from Sasuke mentor at Jounin rank
8341425caf.description: A genjutsu that puts your target to sleep, stunning them for 2 rounds. Perfect for controlling the flow of battle.

e3bc519fa2.name: Creation Rebirth
e3bc519fa2.obtainment: Obtained from Tsunade during Hokage trials
e3bc519fa2.description: A powerful healing technique that continuously restores health. Heals 27% of your max health - Tsunade's legendary medical ninjutsu at work.

9cf5176370.name: Water Dragon Jutsu
9cf5176370.obtainment: Obtained from Tobirama during Hokage trials
9cf5176370.description: Summon a massive water dragon that crashes into your opponent, dealing heavy damage. The Second Hokage's signature technique.

f8a26e605e.name: Flying Raijin Jutsu
f8a26e605e.obtainment: Obtained from Minato during Hokage trials
f8a26e605e.description: The Yellow Flash's legendary technique. Dodge all incoming attacks with 1000 dodge for 1 round while dealing massive damage. Untouchable and deadly.

0def780428.name: Great Forest Crumbling
0def780428.obtainment: Obtained from Hashirama during Hokage trials
0def780428.description: Summon a barrage of wooden branches that crush your enemy and stun them for 2 rounds. The First Hokage's wood style in action.

e7a116cb42.name: Rasenshuriken
e7a116cb42.obtainment: Obtained from Naruto during Hokage trials
e7a116cb42.description: A massive spiraling shuriken of wind chakra that deals devastating damage and causes severe bleeding (5% per round for 3 rounds). Naruto's ultimate technique.

64090843ab.name: Needle Assault
64090843ab.description: Launch senbon needles that inflict bleeding and deal damage. The needles cause 10% bleed damage per round for 2 rounds.

df6166d157.name: Silent Assassination
df6166d157.description: Get into your opponent's blind spot and strike them down. Deals damage and reduces their power and defense by 5% for 3 rounds.

815f82fd08.name: Serpents Wrath
815f82fd08.description: Unleash a devastating serpent attack that deals massive damage and poisons your opponent for 3 rounds. Orochimaru's sinister power.

6bec04d09b.name: Corrupted Ice Prison
6bec04d09b.description: Trap your opponent in a cursed ice prison, stunning them for 2 rounds and draining 3 chakra per round.

a28d91b997.name: Kirin: Lightning Storm
a28d91b997.description: Summon a lightning storm that deals devastating damage to your target. An enhanced version of the regular Kirin.

615b0e96bf.name: 9th Form: Rengoku
615b0e96bf.description: Fire Breathing 9th Form - cut through your target with flames of determination. A technique that embodies the spirit of a flame hashira.

845aa1cc84.name: Guillotine Drop
845aa1cc84.description: Leap high into the air and slam down on your target, shattering their defense. Deals massive damage that ignores most defense, stuns for 2 rounds, and boosts your power and defense by 20x for 4 rounds.

c7aae6cb96.name: Asura's Blade of Execution
c7aae6cb96.obtainment: Obtained after completing the Naruto quest in scroll missions
c7aae6cb96.description: Unleash god-like power that deals massive damage, boosts your stats by 20x, reduces enemy stats by 50%, and stuns them for 2 rounds. An absolute game-changer.

f22fab4d68.name: Explosive Paper Clone
f22fab4d68.description: Tag your target with an explosive tag that detonates after 1 round, dealing 20% of their max health as damage.

3fddb56e69.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu: 1000 Clones
3fddb56e69.description: Create 1000 clones to overwhelm and confuse your target. The sheer numbers cause flinching and deal heavy damage.

c6f8813c6a.name: Lightning Hound
c6f8813c6a.description: Summon a giant hound made of lightning to attack your target, dealing damage and stunning them for 1 round.

ed5c8abcdf.name: Twin Rising Dragons
ed5c8abcdf.description: Soar into the air and barrage your enemy with ninja tools, causing both bleeding and burning (10% per round for 5 rounds each).

ad076ef038.name: Primary Lotus
ad076ef038.description: Kick your target into the air, then spiral them back down to the ground. A taijutsu technique that deals solid damage.

a7bc6314bd.name: Planetary Devastation
a7bc6314bd.description: Trap your target in a black sphere that takes 10 rounds to form. When it detonates, it deals damage equal to 10x their max health - an instant kill if they can't escape.

e595278524.name: Black Flash: Deaths Awakened Itself
e595278524.description: Unleash a devastating upward strike into your opponent's gut with overwhelming force. Deals massive damage, causes bleeding (5% per round for 2 rounds), and stuns for 1 round.

d953c9f5e7.name: Puppet Kazekage
d953c9f5e7.description: Summon a puppet that stays with you until you die, attacking every round. The puppet deals consistent damage turn after turn.

915f4a517d.name: Amaterasu
915f4a517d.description: Summon black flames that burn anything in their path. The flames persist for 30 rounds, dealing 15% of target's health per round. These flames never go out.

7526733d4f.name: Summon Manda
7526733d4f.description: Summon the giant snake Manda to crush your enemy, dealing damage and stunning them for 2 rounds.

728942494c.name: Kamehameha
728942494c.description: Unleash a powerful energy wave at your enemy. Yes, that Kamehameha. It somehow made its way into the shinobi world.

d0140705e6.name: Dynamic Entry
d0140705e6.description: Leap into the air and crash down on your target with a powerful kick. Has a 50% chance to make them flinch.

28a1d940c0.name: Thirty Two Palms
28a1d940c0.description: Strike your target 32 times in rapid succession, dealing damage and draining 30% of their chakra. Byakugan precision at its finest.

78c6d0db38.name: Sixty Four Palms
78c6d0db38.description: Strike your target 64 times in rapid succession, dealing even more damage and draining 50% of their chakra. The ultimate Gentle Fist technique.

05677a7714.name: Eight Gates
05677a7714.description: Open one of the Eight Gates, boosting your power at the cost of health. Each use opens a new gate, up to the 7th gate. Each gate costs 20% of your max health but grants immense power.

389afaa88b.name: Crystal Palace
389afaa88b.description: Create a massive palace of ice crystals that crashes down with devastating force. This technique ignores 75% of enemy armor, deals massive damage, has a 90% chance to apply frost for 2 rounds, and reduces enemy defense by 75% for 2 rounds.

c9936dda9a.name: Ice Prison
c9936dda9a.description: Trap your target in a prison of ice, dealing damage with a 50% chance to stun for 2 rounds and causing bleeding (10% per round for 5 rounds).

d6029e7b52.name: Blizzard Strike
d6029e7b52.description: Create a blizzard that damages your target with a 50% chance to apply frost for 2 rounds, slowing them down.

d64d7d1bfe.name: Tenseigan Chakra Mode
d64d7d1bfe.description: Enter Tenseigan Chakra Mode for 5 rounds. Greatly increases power and defense by 20x, and Tenseigan Orbs attack each round dealing 15% of target's max health. After 5 rounds, you exit the mode.

7bee01fcd9.name: Izanami
7bee01fcd9.description: A forbidden technique that controls space and time. Sets your HP and Chakra to infinity for 3 rounds (Recording Phase). After recording, the Flow Phase starts where your target MUST repeat moves or deal 0 damage, while you auto-repeat moves. Can only be used once. If you're dying without using it, you revive at 1 HP, cleanse all debuffs, and activate Life Drainer mode.

4fcee5864a.name: Life Drainer
4fcee5864a.description: Drain the very life essence of your target. Deals massive damage and steals 50% of their max HP, adding it to yours.
